SeenSamNora: ^[Rowan] Doth mine eyes deceive me? Why, it's Olivia Herrera! In the flesh!
^Yeah, yeah. I actually made it. Glad to be amongst people.

c-0: ^[Rowan] "It's so good to see you. I'm glad you're here."
c-1: ^[Rowan] When was the last time we hung out...? Oh well don't let me keep you, we can reminisce later, go enjoy the party!
